items.title: Colts' Alec Pierce cleared from concussion protocol; back to ‘feeling normal’
items.summary: INDIANAPOLIS – Normalcy has returned for Alec Pierce. And the Indianapolis Colts’ offense. Pierce, one of the NFL’s premier deep threats, has been cleared from the league’s concussion protocol and will return for Sunday’s meeting with the Arizona Cardinals. He’s missed the past two games after suffering a concussion in the week 3 victory at [...]

items.title: Does the Colts recent success ease the pressure on Chris Ballard?
items.summary: Ah, winning. Supporting a winning team increases dopamine and pushes fans to seek more input regarding their favorite team: social media, sports talk radio, analysts coverage, and just watching more sports in general. Instead of having to hide from the world for an entire week to forgot about a bad team, winning just makes everything […]

items.title: Michael Badgley ready for second shot with Colts; Kenny Moore II dealing with Achilles rehab
items.summary: INDIANAPOLIS – The routine has never really changed. Michael Badgley stays ready. For whatever. And for whenever. The Colts signed him as an undrafted rookie out of [...]

items.title: Kicker Michael Badgley brings familiarity and competitiveness in return to Colts: 'He'll fit right in'
items.summary: By kicking in 12 games for the Colts in 2021, Badgley already has well-established relationships with long snapper Luke Rhodes and punter Rigoberto Sanchez that will make his integration into the team “a lot smoother.”

items.title: How are Colts scoring so many points? It starts on first down

That season, Badgley initially was signed to the practice squad after Rodrigo Blankenship [...]

items.summary: INDIANAPOLIS — Lucas Oil Stadium's roof will be closed during Sunday's Colts-Raiders game. Indianapolis enters the matchup with a 3-1 record and is determined to notch another win in front of its home fans. Last week, the Colts lost against the Los Angeles Rams, while the Raiders (1-3) fell to the Bears.

No details of his death have been released. “We are [...]
